definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: Preferably the starting material is dissolved in methanol and a stoichiometric excess of ammonium hydroxide is added.
sentences.chinese: 原料最好溶解于甲醇并加入过量氢氧化铵。

sentences.english: While the oil is cooling mix your methanol and NaOH(lye) to form the methoxide.
sentences.chinese: 当食用油冷却时，先将甲醇和氢氧化钠。

sentences.english: For proliferation inhibit, the effect of gasoline exhaust is slightly greater than methanol exhaust.
sentences.chinese: 汽油车尾气对细胞增殖的抑制作用略大于甲醇车尾气。

sentences.english: The arrangement and structural parameters of the vaporizer are given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中还给出甲醇蒸发器的布置及结构参数。

sentences.english: Microcells use energy sources like hydrogen and methanol.
sentences.chinese: 蜂窝技术使用如氢和甲醇作为能量的来源。

sentences.english: Tetrabutyl ammonium bromide and sodium methoxide were used as catalyst for the reaction.
sentences.chinese: 四丁基溴化铵和甲醇钠构成该反应的双组份催化剂。

sentences.english: There exists no practical engineering instance of treating the methanol-containing waste water of gas field.
sentences.chinese: 气田含甲醇污水处理目前国内尚没有工程实例。

sentences.english: The catalyst has been applied to seventeen low-pressure methanol plants and resulted in remarkable economic benefits.
sentences.chinese: 该催化剂已在国内十多家甲醇厂应用，经济效益显著。

sentences.english: Pharmaceuticals which has methoxy can degrade to yield methanol if the headspace oven temperature is too high.
sentences.chinese: 含甲氧基的药品在较高顶空温度下降解产生甲醇。

sentences.english: The one-dimensional model of Lurgi tude-shell type methanol synthesis reactor has been established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了鲁奇式甲醇合成塔完整的双速率一维模型。

sentences.english: Benzaldehyde and benzyl alcohol are main volatile flavor compounds in Agaricus blazei.
sentences.chinese: 苯甲醛和苯甲醇是姬松茸中的主要风味物质。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it mostly desorbed methylic alcohol within a given time.
sentences.chinese: 同时，它在一定时间内能将甲醇大部分脱附。

sentences.english: The progress of anode electrocatalysts for direct methanol fuel cell in the recent three years is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 阳极电催化剂是直接甲醇燃料电池最重要的组成部分。

sentences.chinese: 阳极电催化剂是直接甲醇燃料电池最重要的组成部分。

sentences.english: It is to evaluate the uncertainty in measurement of methanol concentration in distilled liquor.
